mapper.select: SELECT RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_IMG1, MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO, COUNT_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK SUB WHERE SUB.RESTAURANT_NO = MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AS LIKE_CHECK FROM RESTAURANT MAIN JOIN (SELECT RESTAURANT_NO, COUNT(LIKE_FL) AS "COUNT_NO" FROM REVIEW WHERE LIKE_FL = 'N' GROUP BY RESTAURANT_NO ) SUB2 ON MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO = SUB2.RESTAURANT_NO ORDER BY COUNT_NO DESC

SELECT RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_IMG1, MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK SUB WHERE SUB.RESTAURANT_NO = MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) AS LIKE_CHECK FROM RESTAURANT MAIN ORDER BY RESTAURANT_NO DESC

SELECT RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_IMG1, MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO, LIKE_FL, (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BOOKMARK SUB WHERE SUB.RESTAURANT_NO = MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKE_CHECK FROM RESTAURANT MAIN JOIN (SELECT RESTAURANT_NO, COUNT(LIKE_FL) AS LIKE_FL FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' GROUP BY RESTAURANT_NO ) REVIEW ON MAIN.RESTAURANT_NO = REVIEW.RESTAURANT_NO
